name: Raiden Jets Fighter: Arcade Craft Shooting Game
name_original: Raiden Jets Fighter: Arcade Craft Shooting Game
description:
It is a classic fighter game and very easy, You will love it soon. The main goal is control you fighter to destroy all enemy.
There are totally four fighter for you to choose.They are Dawn Star, Brilliant Glory, Eternal Phoenix and Fire guarder:
1.Dawn Star:
It's design comes from Su35, the most widely used fighter, it is both powerful and flexible.
2.Brilliant Glory:
It's design comes from F18, the most popular figher designed by mustangs. It will show you great power in a dogfight and loved by the usaf.
3.Eternal Phoenix:
It's design comes from F22, it is a next-generation fighter designed by mustangs. It is more powerful, but will lost some mobility in a dogfight.
4.Fire guarder:
It's design comes from J20, it is a classical fighter, but performances very well.
You can control the cool combat fighter and experience the most exciting visual effects. Main weapon all have no up-limit. You can destroy all enemies in the way! You just need to get in your raiden, hold the follows jets and rush at the galaxy! Just go and shoot!
There are many skills to make your dogfights more exciting:
1. Use your ultra combo to escape from other flight attack.
2.There are a lot of bonus in achievement, you can even advance your missle.
3.Remember to get the free coins.
Please send your suggestions to us. We want you had the best game experience. You can send e-mails to iosapp@friendivity.com
